Package dicomxml

Contains utility classes for reading dicom xml.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FileInfoReader This interface is used to display information of an image in the web-interface
 

Class Summary
DimensionsReader Class to read image dimensions that are contained in the xml file of this image
ListImage Class to read the contents in a XML file for specific tag or attribute Used for listing the files contained in an XML file of a DICOMDIR
XMLRenamer  
 

Package dicomxml Description

Contains utility classes for reading dicom xml. It can extract several types of information from the xml files
